alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otero, east central Sierra and northeastern Dona Ana Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 519 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southwest of Three Rivers, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tularosa. This includes Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 80 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
